verses.verse: These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Levi, <S%H3878><s%> and Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> and Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%>
Dan, <S%H1835><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and Asher. <S%H836><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> Er, <S%H6147><s%> and Onan, <S%H209><s%> and Shelah; <S%H7956><s%> which three <S%H7969><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to him of Shua <S%H7774><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%> the Canaanitess. <S%H3669><s%> Er, <S%H6147><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%>'s firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> was wicked <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and he killed him. <S%H4191><s%>
Tamar <S%H8559><s%> his daughter-in <S%H3618><s%>-law bore <S%H3205><s%> him Perez <S%H6557><s%> and Zerah. <S%H2226><s%> All the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> were five. <S%H2568><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez: <S%H6557><s%> Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> and Hamul. <S%H2538><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah: <S%H2226><s%> Zimri, <S%H2174><s%> and Ethan, <S%H387><s%> and Heman, <S%H1968><s%> and Calcol, <S%H3633><s%> and Dara; <S%H1873><s%> five of them in all. <S%H2568><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Carmi: <S%H3756><s%> Achar, <S%H5917><s%> the troubler <S%H5916><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who committed a trespass <S%H4603><s%> in the devoted thing. <S%H2764><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ethan: <S%H387><s%> Azariah. <S%H5838><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> also of Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> who were born <S%H3205><s%> to him: <S%H3396><s%> Jerahmeel, and Ram, <S%H7410><s%> and Chelubai. <S%H3621><s%>

Ram <S%H7410><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Amminadab, <S%H5992><s%> and Amminadab <S%H5992><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Nahshon, <S%H5177><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%>
and Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Salma, <S%H8007><s%> and Salma <S%H8007><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Boaz, <S%H1162><s%>
and Boaz <S%H1162><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Obed, <S%H5744><s%> and Obed <S%H5744><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jesse; <S%H3448><s%>

and Jesse <S%H3448><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of his firstborn <S%H1060><s%> Eliab, <S%H446><s%> and Abinadab <S%H41><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> and Shimea <S%H8092><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%>
Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the fourth, <S%H7243><s%> Raddai <S%H7288><s%> the fifth, <S%H2549><s%>
Ozem <S%H684><s%> the sixth, <S%H8345><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> the seventh; <S%H7637><s%>

and their sisters <S%H269><s%> were Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> and Abigail. <S%H26><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah: <S%H6870><s%> Abishai, <S%H52><s%> and Joab, <S%H3097><s%> and Asahel, <S%H6214><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>
Abigail <S%H26><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Amasa; <S%H6021><s%> and the father <S%H1><s%> of Amasa <S%H6021><s%> was Jether <S%H3500><s%> the Ishmaelite. <S%H3459><s%>

Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hezron <S%H2696><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of <S%H854><s%> children of Azubah <S%H5806><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> and of Jerioth; <S%H3408><s%> and these were her sons: <S%H1121><s%> Jesher, <S%H3475><s%> and Shobab, <S%H7727><s%> and Ardon. <S%H715><s%>
Azubah <S%H5806><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> to him Ephrath, <S%H672><s%> who bore <S%H3205><s%> him Hur. <S%H2354><s%>
Hur <S%H2354><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Uri, <S%H221><s%> and Uri <S%H221><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Bezalel. <S%H1212><s%>

Afterward <S%H310><s%> Hezron <S%H2696><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> whom he took as wife <S%H3947><s%> when he was sixty <S%H8346><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old; <S%H1121><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Segub. <S%H7687><s%>
Segub <S%H7687><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jair, <S%H2971><s%> who had twenty <S%H5892><s%> - three cities in the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

Geshur <S%H1650><s%> and Aram <S%H758><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the towns <S%H2333><s%> of Jair <S%H2971><s%> from them, <S%H7079><s%> with Kenath, and its villages, <S%H2333><s%> even sixty <S%H8346><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%> All these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> that Hezron <S%H2696><s%> was dead <S%H4194><s%> in Caleb Ephrathah, <S%H3613><s%> then Abijah <S%H29><s%> Hezron <S%H2696><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him Ashhur <S%H806><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Tekoa. <S%H8620><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Hezron <S%H2696><s%> were Ram <S%H7410><s%> the firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> and Bunah, <S%H946><s%> and Oren, <S%H767><s%> and Ozem, <S%H684><s%> Ahijah. <S%H281><s%>
Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> had another <S%H312><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Atarah; <S%H5851><s%> she was the mother <S%H517><s%> of Onam. <S%H208><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ram <S%H7410><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> were Maaz, <S%H4619><s%> and Jamin, <S%H3226><s%> and Eker. <S%H6134><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Onam <S%H208><s%> were Shammai, <S%H8060><s%> and Jada. <S%H3047><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shammai: <S%H8060><s%> Nadab, <S%H5070><s%> and Abishur. <S%H51><s%>
The name <S%H8034><s%> of the wife <S%H802><s%> of Abishur <S%H51><s%> was Abihail; <S%H32><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Ahban, <S%H257><s%> and Molid. <S%H4140><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nadab: <S%H5070><s%> Seled, <S%H5540><s%> and Appaim; <S%H649><s%> but Seled <S%H5540><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> without children. <S%H1121><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Appaim: <S%H649><s%> Ishi. <S%H3469><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishi: <S%H3469><s%> Sheshan. <S%H8348><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sheshan: <S%H8348><s%> Ahlai. <S%H304><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jada <S%H3047><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Shammai: <S%H8060><s%> Jether, <S%H3500><s%> and Jonathan; <S%H3129><s%> and Jether <S%H3500><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> without children. <S%H1121><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan: <S%H3129><s%> Peleth, <S%H6431><s%> and Zaza. <S%H2117><s%> These were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jerahmeel. <S%H3396><s%>

Now Sheshan <S%H8348><s%> had no sons, <S%H1121><s%> but daughters. <S%H1323><s%> Sheshan <S%H8348><s%> had a servant, <S%H5650><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Jarha. <S%H3398><s%>
Sheshan <S%H8348><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to Jarha <S%H3398><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%> as wife; <S%H802><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> him Attai. <S%H6262><s%>
Attai <S%H6262><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan <S%H5416><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Zabad, <S%H2066><s%>
and Zabad <S%H2066><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Ephlal, <S%H654><s%> and Ephlal <S%H654><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Obed, <S%H5744><s%>
and Obed <S%H5744><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jehu, <S%H3058><s%> and Jehu <S%H3058><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Azariah, <S%H5838><s%>
and Azariah <S%H5838><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Helez, <S%H2503><s%> and Helez <S%H2503><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Eleasah, <S%H501><s%>
and Eleasah <S%H501><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Sismai, <S%H5581><s%> and Sismai <S%H5581><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shallum, <S%H7967><s%>
and Shallum <S%H7967><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jekamiah, <S%H3359><s%> and Jekamiah <S%H3359><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Elishama. <S%H476><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Jerahmeel <S%H3396><s%> were Mesha <S%H4337><s%> his firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> who was the father <S%H1><s%> of Ziph; <S%H2128><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mareshah <S%H4762><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Hebron. <S%H2275><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hebron: <S%H2275><s%> Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and Tappuah, <S%H8599><s%> and Rekem, <S%H7552><s%> and Shema. <S%H8087><s%>

Shema <S%H8087><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Raham, <S%H7357><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jorkeam; <S%H3421><s%> and Rekem <S%H7552><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shammai. <S%H8060><s%>
The son <S%H1121><s%> of Shammai <S%H8060><s%> was Maon; <S%H4584><s%> and Maon <S%H4584><s%> was the father <S%H1><s%> of Beth Zur. <S%H1049><s%>

Ephah, <S%H5891><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%>'s concubine, <S%H6370><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Haran, <S%H2771><s%> and Moza, <S%H4162><s%> and Gazez; <S%H1495><s%> and Haran <S%H2771><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Gazez. <S%H1495><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jahdai: <S%H3056><s%> Regem, <S%H7276><s%> and Jothan, <S%H3147><s%> and Geshan, <S%H1529><s%> and Pelet, <S%H6404><s%> and Ephah, <S%H5891><s%> and Shaaph. <S%H8174><s%>
Maacah, <S%H4601><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%>'s concubine, <S%H6370><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Sheber <S%H7669><s%> and Tirhanah. <S%H8647><s%>

She bore <S%H3205><s%> also Shaaph <S%H8174><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Madmannah, <S%H4089><s%> Sheva <S%H7724><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Machbena, <S%H4343><s%> and the father <S%H1><s%> of Gibea; <S%H1388><s%> and the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> was Achsah. <S%H5915><s%>

These were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Caleb, <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Ephrathah: <S%H672><s%> Shobal <S%H7732><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Kiriath Jearim, <S%H7157><s%>
Salma <S%H8007><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%H1035><s%> Hareph <S%H2780><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Beth Gader. <S%H1013><s%>
Shobal <S%H7732><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Kiriath Jearim <S%H7157><s%> had sons: <S%H1121><s%> Haroeh, <S%H7204><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of the Menuhoth. <S%H2679><s%>

The families <S%H4940><s%> of Kiriath Jearim: <S%H7157><s%> The Ithrites, <S%H3505><s%> and the Puthites, <S%H6336><s%> and the Shumathites, <S%H8126><s%> and the Mishraites; <S%H4954><s%> of them came <S%H3318><s%> the Zorathites <S%H6882><s%> and the Eshtaolites. <S%H848><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Salma: <S%H8007><s%> Bethlehem, <S%H1035><s%> and the Netophathites, <S%H5200><s%> Atroth <S%H5852><s%> Beth Joab, <S%H5854><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> of the Manahathites, <S%H2680><s%> the Zorites. <S%H6882><s%>

The families <S%H4940><s%> of scribes <S%H5608><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> at Jabez: <S%H3258><s%> the Tirathites, <S%H8654><s%> the Shimeathites, <S%H8101><s%> the Sucathites. <S%H7756><s%> These <S%H1992><s%> are the Kenites <S%H7017><s%> who came <S%H935><s%> of Hammath, <S%H2574><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Rechab. <S%H7394><s%>
